description: This file defines the IEventService interface and its implementation EventService, providing business logic for managing events including create, retrieve, update, and delete operations within an event planning backend.

classes.name: IEventService
classes.description: Interface defining event management operations such as create, retrieve, update, and delete.

classes.name: EventService
classes.description: Concrete implementation of the IEventService interface, encapsulating business rules and repository interactions for event operations.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new event after validating start and end times, associating it with an owner.

methods.name: GetMine
methods.description: Retrieves events owned by a specific user.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a single event by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing event if owned by the requester, after validation.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes an event, potentially removing associated guests.
